categories: Category:Rogue One: A Star Wars Story actors
Category:Solo: A Star Wars Story actors

nodes.text: Lynn Robertson Bruce is a creature and droid performer who worked on Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens, Rogue One: A Star Wars Story, Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi, Solo: A Star Wars Story, and Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker. In The Last Jedi she played Glowen Faquidde and on The Rise of Skywalker she portrayed Albrekh and worked with Robin Guiver to puppeteer D-O.
